function ERU_EP04_04()
    -- .起-2【11月第2週】「姫皇さまがやって来る！でへでへでへ」
    SaveData.Title = "姫皇さまがやって来る！でへでへでへ"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬・昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ November, when the wind has grown cold. As I passed through the gates of Yuriai Private Academy, I happened to run into Lira and Hiyu. ]])

    -- //CG：登校シーン（リラ・ヒユ・エリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc007ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, everyone. It's especially cold today, isn't it?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "GGY! Man, this outfit is definitely chilly, huh? Maybe I should think about a winter uniform coord~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "That's why exhibitionists like Lira are no good. True beauties’ fashion requires modesty, right, Sister Erika?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Girls gotta endure some exposure for the sake of fashion. You think so too, Erika?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Both points have merit, and I think they're wonderful ideas." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Again with full agreement. Seriously, it’s okay to hit back hard at weeds like Hiyu, you know?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "The one who should be hit hard is Lira! A classic beauty like Sister Erika doesn’t need any skin showing!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hmmm. Then what's with the ‘Sister’s Bare Legs’ folder on your phone?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyaaa!? How do you know that?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Oh, for real? That’s disgusting—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Higiyaaaaargh!? You tricked me, you fiend!" ]])

    -- //CG：登校シーン（リラ・ヒユ・エリカ・ウラン）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc007ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0965.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my, it's lively already this morning. Good day, everyone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, Uran, Ryuguuin-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran Ryuguuin】
 "Good day, Sister Erika. Thank you for accompanying me to the burger place yesterday." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I wanted to eat there again as well, so don’t mention it. Let’s go again sometime." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "W-want to invite me next time! I’ll even skip club to join!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Calling other ‘Knights’ too, having a study session while sharing fries sounds fun, right~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0966.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh, I’d also love to join. Burgers are one of those Western dishes I must try at least once." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Wait, did you just say ‘hamburger’ correctly!? Uran-senpai actually said a foreign word without messing up!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0967.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe. I too am trying hard to overcome my weak English skills." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0968.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thanks to the speed riding duel I recently started, my English is rapidly improving.<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0447.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hard to believe, but you probably meant ‘learning,’ right? Also, where did you even pick up riding duels? You duel?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing the usual back-and-forth, I naturally smiled. ]])

    MSG([[ It's been a peaceful month without any trouble. I've fully warmed up to the conservatives, and there's been no quarrels or disputes. ]])

    MSG([[ However, progress on the investigation into Marika-onee-san has been nil. Even gathering information from the second and some third-year students through Uran-san yielded nothing useful. ]])

    MSG([[ After all, the only person who seems likely to give any clues about Marika-onee-san now is Daria-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "By the way, has anyone heard anything about Daria-san recently?" ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone shook their heads in unison. I've lost count of how many times we've had this same exchange. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone cares about Daria-san, not just me, and each is gathering information on their own. Yet, her whereabouts remain unknown. ]])

    MSG([[ The school has no reports either. We’re completely stuck. ]])

    MSG([[ But then, an unexpected piece of information reaches us. ]])

    -- //BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Ine】
 "Oh, good day to you all~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Jassuko】
 "Morning assembly of Erika's group, you say? Speak of the devil, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Good day, Ine-san, Jassuko-san. What rumor are you talking about?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The Heiwayadou sisters blinked in surprise and shared the astonishing news with us. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Ine】
 "Erika-nee, haven’t you heard? There's an interesting rumor going around the academy this morning." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Jassuko】
 "Apparently, from tomorrow until graduation, Hermes will be attending school every day." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes? Why on earth?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Sudden big news while Daria-san remains absent. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be related to Daria-san’s disappearance? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Ine】
 "We haven’t sorted out the details yet. When we get new info, we’ll let you know too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwayadou Jassuko】
 "Since this is the biggest business opportunity since enrollment, we can’t let this big wave pass us by." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you both. Hopefully this turns into a business chance." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0969.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "How is it that even we ‘Princesses’ have heard nothing?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Maybe it was decided on the fly? Hermes-senpai often acts on impulse." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Either way, it’s a chance to learn more about Daria-san. When we meet tomorrow, let’s ask her in detail." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "For now, let’s figure out how to handle Hermes attending school without causing problems." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0970.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe. During the Shirahisai festival, many were so stunned by Hermes-sama’s cuteness they nearly became rioters." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Don’t talk about it like it’s a fond memory... It was rough." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Seriously, needing panic measures just because she attends school is monstrous." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I think you two are pretty amazing too, though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira, the Princess Gal who forces obedience with orders. Uran, the Princess Miko who moves people to tears. ]])

    MSG([[ But the beauty who surpasses even these two is Hermes Himegami, called the ‘<r=ひめおう>Princess Emperor</r>.’ ]])

    MSG([[ The ‘Princess Emperor,’ also called the ‘Princess Royal,’ is the title given to the top beauty of the academy by both name and reality. ]])

    MSG([[ The annual princess election held every March, a unique election where any ‘Princess’ other than oneself may nominate a candidate— ]])

    MSG([[ The winner with the most votes in the ‘<r=ひめおうせんきょ>Princess Emperor Election</r>’ earns this honor. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、リラ（通常）、ヒユ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Speaking of Hermes-sama! Sister Erika, aren’t you going to participate in the Princess Emperor Election!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "M-me? Why would I?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Your popularity is at its peak! I think you could totally take the crown now!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, yeah. I thought the same. Honestly, Erika's riding this wave right now, isn't she?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "If you become Princess Emperor as a first-year, it’d be the legendary return of Marika Ikusa. You should seriously aim for it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What do you mean by ‘return of Marika’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Huh? You don’t know? That’s famous history!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0971.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Maybe it’s so common knowledge at Yuriai Private Academy it’s never come up before." ]])

    MSG([[ Confused by this new topic, Lira and Uran kindly explained the details to me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "First, you get that normally, the higher your year, the more popular the ‘Princess’ tends to be, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. Since they serve as role models, it’s natural to aspire to be a ‘Knight’ of the upperclassmen." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0972.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. Many serve as ‘Princesses’ longer, so popularity tends to increase with seniority." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "From my research, about 60% of all Knights currently follow either third-years Daria or Hermes!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Whoa, crazy. Hermes-senpai has 40%, Daria-senpai 20%, and Uran-senpai and Erika split the remaining 40%, huh?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "No, the Himegami sisters are counted as one group, so effectively both have majority support in the academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Especially Daria is both a ‘Princess’ and Hermes’s ‘Knight.’ We juniors are a different caliber." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So if our Knights have 20%, that’s about three times as many." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Putting it in numbers shows an overwhelming difference. We’ve barely won 20% through tremendous effort, yet they have three times that. ]])

    MSG([[ The ‘Princess Emperor Election’ seems like a distant dream. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    -- //BG：3F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Back to the main topic—your cousin Marika was the first first-year to break the ‘popularity rises with seniority’ rule." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ma")
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "In all of Yuriai Private Academy’s long history, only one person became Princess Emperor as a first-year!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Back then, the unshakable number one, ‘Kira Yukihime’ versus ‘Yuuki’ in the Princess Emperor Election... That was intense." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hiyu and I watched from the junior high stands, and the cheers shook the venue so much we thought it was an earthquake." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "M-Marika-sama’s face was so stunning from afar, I nearly had a nosebleed just remembering it..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0974.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Even among junior high students, Marika-sama’s name was legendary. Truly a living legend." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I had no idea." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As expected of Marika-onee-san. Not only becoming a ‘Princess’ but leaving such an achievement. ]])

    MSG([[ I understand now why people were so surprised when I once claimed to be Marika-onee-san’s brother. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hearing this makes me feel all the more inadequate." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0975.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That’s natural. The title ‘Princess Emperor’ is originally meant for a graduating third-year ‘Princess’ to fill the place left by senior ‘Princesses.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0976.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "For the following year until the next ‘Princess Emperor’ is chosen, they convey the achievements of the graduates." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "When grad's stories get passed down, it motivates us to work harder too." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So it is best if Hermes wins the next princess election. Someone like me isn’t nearly enough—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Then I suddenly realize. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika-onee-san was Princess Emperor as a first-year. And the one chosen as Princess Emperor this March was Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Which means the one who snatched the title from Marika just before she collapsed was— ]])

    -- //SE：チャイムの音
PLAY_SE("SEb016.wav")
WAIT(800)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "No way! We talked too long! Let’s hurry to class!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira pulled my hand, and we hurried up the stairs. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, let’s talk again after school!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_SE("SEb016.wav",3000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0977.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. I’ll be waiting in the Japanese-style room as usual." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Thus, through an unexpected lead, we got closer to the truth. ]])

    MSG([[ Just before Marika collapsed in March this year, she lost the Princess Emperor election and the title. ]])

    MSG([[ And the one who defeated her is Hermes Himegami, who will start attending Yuriai Private Academy tomorrow. Including Daria’s disappearance, it hardly seems like coincidence. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1320.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That’s one more thing I need to ask Hermes about." ]])

    MSG([[ About Marika-onee-san. About Arumeria-san. About when she met me in the past. ]])

    MSG([[ I have so many questions for Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ I can hardly wait to meet her, and my heart races endlessly— ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_05")
end
